short_summary: Procurement, Delivery and Installation of Support Space – Collaborative Furniture to Edmonton
description: 1. This procurement is issued pursuant to PSPC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/xxx/PQ and covers a requirement from the following Product Category(ies) of the SA: Product Category: Office furniture (Support Space – Collaborative Furniture)2. Health Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa on or by March 31st, 2023.3. This procurement covers a requirement to be solicited amongst the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders).4. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).5. There is no security requirement associated with the requirement. For additional information, consult the bid solicitation document.5. Bids must be received before 2 o’clock (EST), Friday 3 February 2023. Bids received after this time and date will not be considered.
